name: The Sacred Panties
tagline: Zork inspired game repository (May be considered kind of perverted, not much though)
body:
# Welcome to The sacred panties webpage.

###About the game
This game was inspired by [Zork](http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/5zyoqrsugeopel3ffhz_vq/zork).
The main diference is that insted of a typical adventorous universe that Zork recreates you incarnate a homeless girl who is searching for her most valuable possesion, the panties of her beloved one.

### Map
[![https://gyazo.com/635ae6cd09d22c02c83d86f53e7ddb9d](https://i.gyazo.com/thumb/200/_9f499cae27809e0b53b559f39b8a62e8-png.jpg)](https://gyazo.com/635ae6cd09d22c02c83d86f53e7ddb9d)
***

I'm pretty noob with this github stuff so I leave the link for the latest realese here: [Release](https://github.com/Yulna/Zork-Tribute/releases)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
